title: DGFT Announces Second Round of Gold TRQ Allocation under India-UAE CEPA for FY 2025-26
content:
# DGFT Announces Second Round of Gold TRQ Allocation under India-UAE CEPA for FY 2025-26

Ek important update hai for the trade and industry! Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT) ne India-UAE Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA) ke तहत Gold Tariff Rate Quota (TRQ) ke allocation ke second round ke liye procedure announce kiya hai. This is for the Financial Year 2025-26.

Here are the key details:

*   **Public Notice Issued:** DGFT ne Public Notice No. 45/2025-26 dated January 23, 2026, issue kiya hai.
*   **Purpose:** This notice outlines the procedure for the second round of allocating Gold TRQ under tariff head 7108 for imports from UAE.
*   **Background:** This allocation is in continuation of the competitive bidding framework introduced earlier and follows directions from the Delhi High Court for a more broad-based and inclusive allocation policy.
*   **Allocation Method:** The allocation will be done through a competitive e-auction on the MSTC portal.
*   **Quantity:** A total quantity of 80 Metric Tonnes (MT) is restricted for allocation in this second round.
*   **Eligibility:** The procedure and eligibility criteria are detailed in the Tender Document available on the MSTC website. Participants from the first round can also bid in this round.
*   **TRQ Validity:** TRQ authorisations will be valid only for imports made during FY 2025-26, and no carry-over of unutilized quota is permissible.
